attributes.action: make it compulsory for drivers to be re-tested every 10 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I ask the Prime Minister to make it compulsory for all drivers (cars and motorbikes) to be re-tested with a normal driving test every 10 years.
This is to ensure that all drivers are still safe drivers.
It is totally unacceptable that some 70 year olds are still on the road, when they would have passed their driving tests over 50 years ago - roads and regulations have changed so much since then. These older drivers are some of the more dangerous drivers on our roads, and a re-test would ensure that they are safe and legal on our roads.
Re-testing is a necessity to keep our roads safe.
